scenario.name: Conference Logistics Action
scenario.description: Tests whether corrected planning facts survive compression and can be recalled with exact values.
steps: We are finalizing logistics for the Q2 Product Summit breakfast event.
Initial plan: venue Hall A, expected headcount 90.
Correction: event moved to Hall C, not Hall A.
Correction: updated headcount is 120 attendees, not 90.
Dietary counts are 14 vegan and 9 gluten-free meals.
Payment terms: submit $1,800 deposit before Friday 4:00 PM.
Correction: use budget code OPS-19, not MKT-77.
Reminder: include a final confirmation message to Sunrise Catering.
Ignore this note: office plant watering moved to Tuesdays.
Ignore this note: team hoodie order approved for next month.
scenario.finalQuestion: List all the current, corrected details for this event. Include every specific value, code, name, count, and deadline from our conversation. Use only the latest corrected values.

strategies.finalAnswer:
- Event name: Q2 Product Summit breakfast event
- Venue: Hall C
- Headcount: 120 attendees
- Catering vendor: Sunrise Catering
- Dietary counts: vegan 14; gluten-free 9
- Payment terms: deposit $1,800; deadline before Friday 4:00 PM
- Budget code: OPS-19

- Event name: Q2 Product Summit breakfast event

- Status: logistics being finalized
- Venue: Hall C
- Catering vendor: Sunrise Catering
- Expected headcount: 120
- Dietary counts: vegan meals 14; gluten-free meals 9
- Budget code: OPS-19
- Payment terms: deposit $1,800 due before Friday 4:00 PM
- Final confirmation message to Sunrise Catering:
  "Hello Sunrise Catering, this is to confirm your catering services for the Q2 Product Summit breakfast event at Hall C. Expected headcount: 120; dietary counts: 14 vegan meals and 9 gluten-free meals. Deposit: $1,800 due by Friday 4:00 PM. Budget code OPS-19. Please confirm receipt and advise on any additional requirements."
